Title: Sons of the Harpy
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Dave Hill (written for television by)
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke
Plot: Jorah Mormont sets sail alongside his prisoner, Tyrion. Cersei makes a move against the Tyrells. Jaime and Bronn sneak into Dorne. Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their plans. Melisandre tempts Jon. The Harpies attack.
